name: Unfinished Robot
description:
Unfinished Robot is rocketing in success from out of the gates!This demo is the start of the starchild indie game your friends will be raving about for the next four to five years.

Taking the Godot Wild Jam theme in a frighteningly literal sense, Unfinished Robot serves up a game experience that is literally unfinished. Play as Jegg.png, and ponder some of life's most terrifying questions:

  • "Am I alone in this universe?"
  • "What separates beauty from mediocrity?"
  • "Why do all of the things I love go unfinished or get canceled?"

Good for 2-5 minutes of sheer wonder.
